sqlMap.select: /* getPrimaryJstreeMonitor */ SELECT c_id , c_parentid , c_position , c_left , c_right , c_level , c_title , c_type , f_c_id FROM T_PRIMARY_COMPREHENSIVETREE ORDER BY c_parentid, c_position
/* getForeignJstreeMonitor */ SELECT c_id , c_parentid , c_position , c_left , c_right , c_level , c_title , c_type FROM T_FOREIGN_COMPREHENSIVETREE ORDER BY c_parentid, c_position
